23:32:35","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 23:32:35","title":"MM Select | Spring 2015","link":"http://www.minimallyminimal.com/blog/mm-select-spring-2015","description":"<p class=\"text-align-center\">★☆☆☆<br />Avoid. Mediocre.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\">★★☆☆<br />Good, but nothing exceptional.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\">★★★☆<br />Great.&#160;Worth purchasing.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\">★★★★<br />Exceptional. A spectacular product.</p><hr /><p class=\"text-align-center\">DISCLAIMER<br />Some of these products have been sent by their respective manufacturers.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769416388-LOPAEA3MIUE5FKUZ7JWC/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fb83c4e4b018d49672838c\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769416388-LOPAEA3MIUE5FKUZ7JWC/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.yu-be.com/product-info/\"><strong>Yu-Be Lip Balm</strong></a><br />$8<br />Japan<br />★★<span>☆</span>☆</p><p>Yu-Be was founded in 1957 by a pharmacist named Yoshikiyo Nowatari, who invented the brand’s infamous glycerin-based moisturizing cream that is sold to this day. The Yu-Be lip balm follows a similar formula as the cream but adds a number of ingredients like coconut oil, sweet almond oil, and aloe vera. I’ve found the lip balm to be fairly effective and like its pine-like smell. It’s worth recommending for mildly dry lips but Burt’s Bees still seem to make the more effective product.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425780932122-GWJ8YI3ZTJDZGG6U9CWG/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fbb0c3e4b0d3db827d4c6b\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425780932122-GWJ8YI3ZTJDZGG6U9CWG/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.coteetciel.com/en-US/seine-bowler-bag-memory-tech-black\"><strong>Côte&#38;Ciel Seine Memory Tech</strong></a><br />$184<br />France<br />★★★☆</p><p>Inspired by the shape of classic bowling bags, the Côte&#38;Ciel Seine is able to carry a 13” MacBook and is surprisingly high capacity thanks to its flexible design. In typical&#160;<span>Côte&#38;Ciel fashion, the quality of hardware, stitching and materials all exceptional.&#160;</span>It's functional too with&#160;plenty of pockets and clever little touches like a detachable key ring. The only complaint I have is with the material of the bag, which Côte&#38;Ciel calls “Memory Tech”, is just a bit too thin and I'm not sold on the&#160;wrinkly in appearance. I would personally go with the cheaper Eco Yarn model.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769961718-KAUEBJ0TR5ES7489X7Q8/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fb85e7e4b021ab841baf7a\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769961718-KAUEBJ0TR5ES7489X7Q8/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://store.nike.com/us/en_us/product/air-max-1-ultra-moire-id/\"><strong>Nike Air Max 1 Ultra Moire iD</strong></a><br />$170<br />USA<br />★★★☆</p><p>The Air Max 1 Ultra Moire is one the newest models in the Air Max family and is all about the reduction of weight and materials. The shoe features a new outsole that has deep cutouts, reducing material use while increasing flexibility. I noticed the difference in weight immediately and found them to be the most comfortable Air Max model I’ve ever tried. The perforated pattern also makes it my favorite design so far, and looks particularly great on a white shoe. I ordered mine from Nike iD in all white with a silver logo, though in retrospect should’ve made the logo white as well. It’s a classic shape, with a fresh new perforated design and also a major improvement in comfort.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769441329-UDX4JM9MD7VDU5RATY4G/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fb83dde4b018d49672841b\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769441329-UDX4JM9MD7VDU5RATY4G/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.aesop.com/usa/body-care/resurrection-aromatique-hand-balm-3.html\"><strong>Aēsop&#160;Resurrection Aromatique Hand Balm</strong></a><br />$27<br />Australia<br />★★★★</p><p>Aēsop is an Australian skin care brand and make some spectacular products. My hands have been really dry this winter and I ended up with the Resurrection Aromatique Hand Balm at an Aēsop store after falling in &#160;love with its smell. Its sweet, herbaceous aroma is so good that I find myself applying it even when I don’t need to. It also does a good job of moisturizing while absorbing quickly into the skin without leaving a greasy surface. Best of all, like all Aēsop products, it comes in beautifully graphic packaging.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769890206-BJPUNOML6JSQAI50LW8N/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fb85a0e4b0744cac54295a\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769890206-BJPUNOML6JSQAI50LW8N/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.muji.us/store/skin-care-1.html\"><strong>Muji Skin Care</strong></a><br />$10-25<br />Japan<br />★★<span>★★</span></p><p>If you’re looking for tremendous value, nothing comes close to Muji’s skin care lineup. I bought a bottle of lotion out of pure curiosity on a business trip and have been using/recommending Muji skin care products ever since. Their products are divided into three lines differentiated by bottle color; Sensitive (white), Organic (green) and Aging (brown).&#160;Muji takes the approach of providing hydration and protection to skincare, which the company says is the root cause of most&#160;problems. All of the products provide excellent hydration, don’t leave residue and are extremely mild, which makes them perfect for delicate skin. A 200ml bottle of their standard moisturizing milk is only $10.50 and will last forever. Do yourself a favor and at least try a travel size bottle.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425771272410-R78PNU5TNFIXMJKFUF7U/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fb8b06e4b0c9648d5cea86\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425771272410-R78PNU5TNFIXMJKFUF7U/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.hibiki-an.com\"><strong><span>Hibiki-an&#160;</span></strong></a><br />$ NA<br />Japan<br />★★<span>★</span>☆</p><p>I’m a big fan of matcha and came across hibiki-an.com after looking for a simple way to import the tea from Japan. Hibiki-an operates directly from Kyoto and makes it super easy to buy some of the highest quality tea from the country. Once you try their Pinnacle (30g/$40) and Super Premium (40g/$34) grade matchas from them, you won’t be able to drink anything else. The company also sells a large variety of other teas and accessories like whisks and bowls, making it the perfect one&#160;stop shop. International shipping is also free on orders over $36, which seals the deal for me.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425772060669-MK3BK17IZWSHJK9DSKFB/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fb8e1ae4b056182e1d48c1\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425772060669-MK3BK17IZWSHJK9DSKFB/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://store.alessi.com/usa/en-gb/catalog/detail/glass-family-glass-set/ajm29\"><strong>Alessi Glass Family Goblet (AJM29/2)</strong></a><br />$36 / set of 4<br />Italy<br />★<span>★★</span>★</p><p>Designed by the infamous contemporary designer, Jasper Morrison, the Family Goblet by Alessi is made from crystal glass.&#160;It's an understated, utilitarian interpretation of the wine glass, free of any pretension. Those looking for a more traditional wine glass won’t like the short stem but I like the stability and sense of durability it provides. It’s a product that doesn’t feel precious and is&#160;something that you can use everyday. I like that.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425772163411-7S74UD0U9YXVSXMDU91T/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fb8e7fe4b0a61cf90aaacd\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425772163411-7S74UD0U9YXVSXMDU91T/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/categories/departments/eating/series/07699/\"><strong>Ikea&#160;365+&#160;Series</strong></a><br />$3-5<br />Sweden<br /><span>★</span><span>★★</span><span>☆</span></p><p>Most of the stuff Ikea makes is disposable garbage but if you dig deep enough, you can find some fantastic gems. The dinnerware in the Ikea’s 365+ Series are made from feldspar porcelain, are durable and pretty attractive looking as well. I really like the off-white color, lack of ornamentation and the rounded, modern forms. Of course, because they’re so cheap, you can’t expect Alessi or iittala quality but they’re honestly not&#160;bad&#160;for being just a few dollars each.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://coolenoughstudio.com\"><strong>Cool Enough Studio</strong></a><br />$ NA<br />Korea<br />★<span>☆☆</span>☆</p><p>Based out of Seoul, Cool Enough Studio produces a variety of objects from calendars to cushions. Their best seller is <em>Mirror</em>, a compact mirror in a prism-like shape. When the studio reached out to me, I was most fascinated by their&#160;calendar called <em>Have A Nice Year</em>, which turns out to&#160;unfortunately offer&#160;no real-world functionality. It pains me to give anyone a one star review but I had to after trying their <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://coolenoughstudio.com/wp/?portfolio_page=hanger\">hanger</a>, which has the primary functionality of ruining shoulders of clothing. There's simply not enough substance to be had here, and is&#160;only made worse when realizing that pricing is also pretty steep considering the lackluster quality and craftsmanship.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425780875812-6RG4LTORCEKV66F0XHY6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fbb08ae4b0297e020de9c4\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425780875812-6RG4LTORCEKV66F0XHY6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.zojirushi.com/app/product/nsyac\"><strong><span>Zojirushi NS-YAC10</span></strong></a><br />$250<br />Japan<br />★<span>★★</span>☆</p><p>As far as rice cookers go, Zojirushi is probably the most famous brand that exists.&#160;The NS-YAC10 uses a Micom system (for those new to rice cookers, <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.minimallyminimal.com/blog/muji-rice-cooker-by-naoto-fukasawa?rq=zojirushi\">refer to this post</a>) and is about as nice as they get before you go up to an induction model. The Zojirushi’s logic seems to react well to different water levels and types of rice resulting in perfectly cooked rice every time. There are countless cooking modes but “Umami” is my favorite logic setting. It soaks and steams the rice for an extended period, enhancing its flavor and texture. The only drawback is that it extends the cooking time significantly but I find myself using it whenever I have some time to spare. If you’re looking for a flawless, fuss-free rice cooker, this is as good as it gets. If only Zojirushi would hire better designers. Ugh… look at the terrible typography.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425772629477-JIPIASZ0XWT37IXC5AD2/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54fb9053e4b056182e1d51c1\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425772629477-JIPIASZ0XWT37IXC5AD2/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://snowpeak.com/products/stainless-double-330-mug-mg-113?variant=671142757\"><strong>Snow Peak Stainless Double 330 Mug</strong></a><br />$20<br />Japan<br />★<span>★★</span><span>★</span></p><p>Snow Peak is a camping gear manufacturer but many of their products end up being used in the home because of their sheer attractiveness. It almost makes it excusable that they call themselves a&#160;“natural lifestyle creator\". The Stainless Double Mug has a simple shape and has a beautiful mirror finish that reminds me of iPod backs. It has a double-walled design, which does a good job of insulating your drinks, whether it be&#160;at a campsite or&#160;at home like myself. My favorite touch is how the mug has sharp external edges but rounds inwards, creating a soft surface for your lips.</p>&#160;&#160;","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Sun, 15 Mar 2015 22:39:00 +0000","feedId":6606,"bgimg":"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769416388-LOPAEA3MIUE5FKUZ7JWC/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w","linkMd5":"07c96af20d565b42fc7e24d91da47646","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn53@2020_2/2020/08/25/15-32-36-049_5930813c50a5ad6a.webp","destWidth":1000,"destHeight":663,"sourceBytes":120858,"destBytes":4920,"author":"Andrew Kim","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769416388-LOPAEA3MIUE5FKUZ7JWC/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn53@2020_2/2020/08/25/15-32-36-049_5930813c50a5ad6a.webp","https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425780932122-GWJ8YI3ZTJDZGG6U9CWG/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn61@2020_2/2020/08/25/15-32-48-726_de478a4e138666cc.webp","https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769961718-KAUEBJ0TR5ES7489X7Q8/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn69@2020_4/2020/08/25/15-33-03-196_7df78ffa7b14ce43.webp","https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769441329-UDX4JM9MD7VDU5RATY4G/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn89@2020_5/2020/08/25/15-32-53-808_fc99bfbbf4309697.webp","https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425769890206-BJPUNOML6JSQAI50LW8N/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2Wot P8OC5SYOABR885E3/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn5@2020_6/2020/08/25/15-32-50-760_40c6af02f28fae34.webp","https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425780875812-6RG4LTORCEKV66F0XHY6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn69@2020_4/2020/08/25/15-32-51-954_15823d6880b7a88c.webp","https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1425772629477-JIPIASZ0XWT37IXC5AD2/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn38@2020_5/2020/08/25/15-32-45-013_c79cbe5789824b52.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598369555794},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 23:32:35","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 23:32:35","title":"Seoul | MM Travel Guide | 14","link":"http://www.minimallyminimal.com/blog/seoul-mm-travel-guide-14","description":"<figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419206086025-O781AA32U4U1GSIXXXAW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/20141207-L1023033.jpg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"20141207-L1023033.jpg\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54975dc5e4b0fde32695d114\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419206086025-O781AA32U4U1GSIXXXAW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/20141207-L1023033.jpg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>I apologize for my slow pacing of posts as of late. I’ve been busy with both work and&#160;my private life, giving me&#160;limited free time to work on&#160;the blog. I have some exciting new posts on the way though,&#160;and will start posting new types of content in the new year that I think you guys will love. The past month has been a bit of a transformative and clearly reflective moment in my life and has inspired me to really jump-start some self initiated work.&#160;</p><p>I just got back from a two week business trip to Seoul&#160;and wanted to share some of the more interesting places I had the chance to visit. I would have liked to share more places but I was too busy to document every place I went. Unfortunately, two of the locations will have to suffice with just Instagram photos.</p><p>Happy Holidays, and I'll see you in 2015.</p>&#160;<hr /><p class=\"text-align-center\">★☆☆☆<br />Avoid, a waste of time.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\">★★☆☆<br />Good, but mediocre.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\">★★★☆<br />Great.&#160;Worth a visit.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\">★★★★<br />Exceptional. A spiritual experience.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\"> </p><p class=\"text-align-center\"><strong>$</strong><br />Affordable</p><p class=\"text-align-center\"><strong>$$</strong><br />Reasonable</p><p class=\"text-align-center\"><strong>$$$</strong><br />Pricey</p>&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>Sushi Matsumoto </strong><br />Apgujeong-dong<br />★★★★<br />$$$</p><p> </p><p>This is possibly the best sushi I’ve had in not just Seoul, but the world. Run by Mizuho, a Japanese chef, Matsumoto is impeccably run with a helplessly clean, Japanese attitude. Being at this place is a calming, therapeutic experience. The agility and dexterity of the chefs make great visual entertainment and the food can only be described as stunning. Matsumoto is the epitome of adroit Japanese artistry. Pricing is aggressive but not unusual for this quality - omakase starts at approximately $170 and heads north of $200 for longer courses. Something also worth noting is the kindness of the staff here. After seeing me take photos, the waitress laid a cloth on my table telling me it was to rest my camera on. I just can’t help but love this place. I miss it already.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54975f04e4b015fce7f6c28a\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419206406449-TT0OUA2BHJF40GM9RW6A/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419206745771-FN1IISHPXCZLMLKLQ5H3/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54976058e4b0ba0bff5b35ad\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419206745771-FN1IISHPXCZLMLKLQ5H3/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>Sushi U </strong><br />Daechi-dong<br />★★★★<br />$$$</p><p> </p><p>Sushi U is a restaurant that I make sure I visit whenever I’m in Seoul. The quality of ingredients are always great and the experience consistent. The restaurant was once run by the sushi master Matsudo Toshio but is currently headed by Korean chef Noh Seung Gu. The quality has remained constant though, and Noh continues to experiment with new flavors and techniques just as Matsudo has. Make sure you sit at the bar and talk with the chef - he’ll try new things right in front of you and ask for your opinion. What I love about this restaurant is that it feels like a creative studio always willing to trying new things and stepping out of its comfort zone. I’ve certainly been to better places that fit into the classical definition of “sushi” but there’s something appealing about coming here as a designer that appreciates creativity. By the way, I don’t know how serious he was but Noh said that he’ll treat Minimally Minimal readers with extra care if they visit.&#160;</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\"        sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419209167443-F4JC6UWDNKYQZ7V4A4MM/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"549769cee4b0efb497e8bd2a\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419209167443-F4JC6UWDNKYQZ7V4A4MM/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>Park Hyatt Seoul</strong><br />Daechi 2-dong<br />★★★★<br />$$$</p><p> </p><p>As far as hotels go, this is pretty much as good as it gets. I hate the traditional, baroque aesthetics of most hotels but Park Hyatt has a modern, sophisticated ambiance that is truly refreshing. Helpful staff, comfortable rooms, a fantastic gym/sauna, delicious breakfast and convenient transit options makes this the best hotel in Seoul. The rooms are also stocked with Aesop products which is makes the stay even more enjoyable. The hotel overlooks Samseong Station, which provides an awesome view of the World Trade Center and its neighboring skyscrapers too. The only thing I can complain about is that the staff tries to be almost too helpful and makes you feel a bit uncomfortable. I really don’t need to be asked if I need anything everyday or have my elevator opened for me.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n        sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419208429852-KOR2SO3YL54IUAYVBXA6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"549766ece4b0bf0af3662776\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419208429852-KOR2SO3YL54IUAYVBXA6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>누하의숲 </strong><br />Hyoja-dong<br />★★☆☆<br />$</p><p> </p><p>A tiny and immensely tranquil Japanese comfort food restaurant, 누하의숲, or Nuha No Mori, feels like a precious existence in the harsh realities of Seoul. The restaurant revs their menu constantly and only offers two options at a time. I love this place conceptually and want to give it a high rating but I didn’t really enjoy what I was served at my visit. I’ve heard great things about this place so I’m going to give them the benefit of doubt and say that I picked the wrong dish.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54976b5ce4b0ce400b9c03fd\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419209565997-M7GNQBBFVNJ9V728AH7Z/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>제주항</strong><br />Sinsa-dong<br />★★★★<br />$$</p><p> </p><p>If I had to pick my top 10 favorite restaurants in the world, this would be in the list. 제주항 specializes in seafood with an emphasis on ingredients and dishes from Jeju Island (an island located just southwest of Korea). The abalone porridge and grilled/stewed mackerel are my personal favorites but I’ve honestly never had anything bad here. Most people think of Korean barbecue as the quintessential Korean cuisine but as someone that doesn’t really like meat, this embodies what I love most about the&#160;peninsula’s gastronomy.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n        sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419209890639-QGXCMGTRK8L4DZC6QW6G/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54976ca1e4b08da3f828af21\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419209890639-QGXCMGTRK8L4DZC6QW6G/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>Cha Cha </strong><br />Apgujeong-dong<br />★★☆☆<br />$$</p><p>I like this place. Cha Cha is a casual, unpretentious wine bar with a decent selection. Unfortunately, the pricing seems a bit unreasonably high for an American and their cheese platter isn’t up to snuff. As a dog lover, I can’t help but say that my favorite thing about Cha Cha is the chef’s adorable dog, Tofu, who always hangs out by the register.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n        sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419210211023-5T6PNKZLWM2AV30RSOI6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54976de1e4b027d89235c720\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419210211023-5T6PNKZLWM2AV30RSOI6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>개화옥 </strong><br />Sinsa-dong<br />★★<span>★</span>☆<br />$$</p><p>개화옥 does classic Korean dishes in a simple, clean fashion. They do a great job with meat entrees and also have a fantastc aged steak. Flavors are on the mild side but still pleasant, which is particularly apparent in their interpretation of doenjang jjigae. Overuse of seasoning and msg can get a bit tiring so this sets a nice tempo for your stay in the city. Something I also like about this place is their selection of silverware and diningware. Most Korean restaurants use generic, often times plastic ones but 개화옥 take a little bit more care.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>Upper West </strong><br />Sinsa-dong<br />★★★☆<br />$$</p><p> </p><p>Upper West is clearly a simulation of a bar in NYC and has a largely nostalgic atmosphere. They are a cocktail focused bar located right by Garosugil, making it convenient to access. The drinks are generally on the sweeter side so if you’re a serious drinker, this may not be the place to go although I find it a great starting point for the night.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>Deux Crème </strong><br />Sinsa-dong<br />★☆☆☆<br />$$</p><p> </p><p>This place is apparently insanely popular in Seoul right now. When I went, I had to get takeout as open seats weren’t even available. Overall, I wasn’t all that impressed and couldn’t fully understand the hype. The tarts were fine but nothing to write home about and don’t even operate on the same level as Lady M.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419211324641-5Q0YI57VD54H3H56NZHR/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5497723be4b00bbcd9f205d6\" data-type=\"image\"        sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419211340982-WLB6O570FC3LZZC8D5PR/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5497724be4b00bbcd9f205f4\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419211340982-WLB6O570FC3LZZC8D5PR/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419211356076-1QIWNAKEFDT83EWAHP3C/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5497725ae4b00bbcd9f2062b\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419211356076-1QIWNAKEFDT83EWAHP3C/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>Bastille </strong><br />Sinsa-dong<br />★★☆☆<br />$</p><p> </p><p>Bastille specializes in soft-serve ice-cream topped with some unique toppings, which is then served on a bed of dry ice. I have a soft spot for visuals so I would actually go to this place again, just to marvel at their presentation. But overall, Bastille reminds me of Momofuku Milk Bar, not only because they sell cereal milk but because they exemplify acceptable mediocrity wrapped in an appeal package.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419211394160-BHSPKAGQHWKO0XCLXZI7/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54977281e4b04b06d45d3070\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1419211394160-BHSPKAGQHWKO0XCLXZI7/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>Gelati Gelati </strong><br />Seogyo-dong<br />★★★☆<br />$</p><p>Despite it being -5 °C, I thoroughly enjoyed my two scoops from Gelati Gelati outside in the brutal Seoul winter. There’s definitely better gelato in the world but this place is worth notice for their rice gelato. I thought it sounded like a terrible idea but in practice, it’s delicious. Think gelato equivalent of mochi. If it were summer, I would have enjoyed it only more.</p>&#160;<center><blockquote data-instgrm-version=\"4\" class=\"instagram-media\">  <p><a href=\"https://instagram.com/p/wYuLz3pOir/\" target=\"_top\">A photo posted by Andrew Kim (@mnmllymnml)</a> on <time datetime=\"2014-12-09T12:39:17+00:00\">Dec 12, 2014 at 4:39am PST</time></p></blockquote> </center>&#160;<hr />&#160;<p><strong>Why Not?</strong><br />Hannam-dong<br />★★★★<br />$$</p><p>One of my all-time favorite bars. Why Not? is serious about their drinks and don’t even have a menu, expecting their customers to have a basic knowledge about what they like. That’s not to say that they’re pretentious though; their bartending staff are knowledgeable, courteous and are willing to make thoughtful recommendations. My favorite drink is an old fashioned and Why Not? clearly has the best one in Seoul.</p>&#160;<center><blockquote data-instgrm-version=\"4\" class=\"instagram-media\">  <p><a href=\"https://instagram.com/p/weGsJHJOto/\" target=\"_top\">A photo posted by Andrew Kim (@mnmllymnml)</a> on <time datetime=\"2014-12-11T14:49:37+00:00\">Dec 12, 2014 at 6:49am It's a site where we will be sharing our thoughts, work and more. We decided to create it because it was something we wanted to read ourselves.&#160;On the site today, you'll find <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.ichelleim.com/felt\">felt</a><em>,</em> a limited edition book that will go on sale very soon, and a small sampling of the types of content you can expect to see more of, like a concept <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://www.ichelleim.com/blogif/001\">drone</a>. />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<p>As many of you have noticed, Minimally Minimal has not been updated for quite some time.&#160;I know that many are eagerly waiting for my next post and checking frequently so I apologize for not giving a proper explanation of what's going on. There are three major reasons for this. First, I’ve been busier with work than ever before. As some of you may know, I’m an industrial designer on HoloLens and I’ve gradually been given bigger responsibilities that take more of my mental capacity. It’s an exciting product to be working on but also has many complex problems being a pioneering device. Next, I recently got engaged to my now fiancée, Michelle, and am getting married in a few months. If you’ve gone through wedding planning, you may know how much work it ends up being. It’s been taking up a lot of my free time, leaving very little opportunity to write something for the blog. Lastly (and probably most interesting to the readers), I’m working on a book with my fiancée called FELT. It was planned to be an earlier release but we've become more ambitious and now plan on making it a physical book available for purchase this summer. Until then, I don't know if I'll have enough free time to do my usual style of reviews. I don't want to over-promise so let's plan on keeping in touch primarily via <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.instagram.com/mnmllymnml/\">Instagram</a>.</p><p>See you after the wedding.</p><p> </p><p>-<br />Im of Ichelle Im</p>&#160;&#160;","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Wed, 13 Apr 2016 23:04:48 +0000","feedId":6606,"bgimg":"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1460588891002-2OTVDEYQ66288IYA18JR/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kDLUZ5g0fP6oKUAKFNHO9Rl7gQa3H78H3Y0txjaiv_0foK0_pu8zR-rUACGbiQ0qjFuj6DD1CwvCNZ7MeN8JDjwxcz-bAVWTbgKWtk3wOWaiOqpeNLcJ80NK65_fV7S1UVzPv4F2haT_rNKU3t-xeFJh5qHVrCDMjW9SN1aMsbClbmhJHsWZjv2iU5d59_vVTg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w","linkMd5":"db527e1799f2186b63b018ab455e5119","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn98@2020_1/2020/08/25/15-32-36-070_751e9c0f05e7168e.webp","destWidth":1000,"destHeight":1000,"sourceBytes":399650,"destBytes":13458,"author":"Andrew Kim","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1460588891002-2OTVDEYQ66288IYA18JR/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kDLUZ5g0fP6oKUAKFNHO9Rl7gQa3H78H3Y0txjaiv_0foK0_pu8zR-rUACGbiQ0qjFuj6DD1CwvCNZ7MeN8JDjwxcz-bAVWTbgKWtk3wOWaiOqpeNLcJ80NK65_fV7S1UVzPv4F2haT_rNKU3t-xeFJh5qHVrCDMjW9SN1aMsbClbmhJHsWZjv2iU5d59_vVTg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn98@2020_1/2020/08/25/15-32-36-070_751e9c0f05e7168e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598369555790},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 23:32:35","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 23:32:35","title":"AIAIAI TMA-2","link":"http://www.minimallyminimal.com/blog/aiaiai-tma-2","description":"<figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431826857977-REYZTCDM5R7RQM82YEP6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557f1a5e4b0741e9be77e94\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431826857977-REYZTCDM5R7RQM82YEP6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://aiaiai.dk\">AIAIAI</a> is a Danish brand that exclusively produces headphones. The TMA-1 was an immensely successful product for them and was&#160;the product that really put them on the map. The company recently launched a successor to the popular TMA-1, the <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://aiaiai.dk/headphones/tma-2\">TMA-2</a>, and while the headphones look nearly identical in design, there are some new and interesting ideas AIAIAI is playing with. Execution has been AIAIAI’s number one issue for me, so we’ll see how well they’ve done this time.&#160;</p>&#160;<hr />&#160;<p class=\"text-align-center\"><span>DISCLAIMER</span><br /><span>The TMA-2&#160;has&#160;been sent by AIAIAI.</span></p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431820937046-MMFJ7EWGLNLC5UW0WRJ0/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557da88e4b028241f153f59\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431820937046-MMFJ7EWGLNLC5UW0WRJ0/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The big idea behind the TMA-2 is the idea of modularity. The headphones are made up of a variety of modular parts, which include speaker units, headbands, earpads and cables, that can be all be easily swapped out. All in all, there are 360 possible configurations possible with the TMA-2. The ability to build your own headphones is a brilliant idea and is something that AIAIAI can also expand on in the future, with additional modules.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431820727686-XOFPMHDZPDVEL2STJFC3/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/20150516-L1001873.jpg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"20150516-L1001873.jpg\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557d9b6e4b009369bbc60bc\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431820727686-XOFPMHDZPDVEL2STJFC3/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/20150516-L1001873.jpg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431820745026-OAPM2XF9PYW22J584Z29/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557d9c8e4b009369bbc60f5\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431820745026-OAPM2XF9PYW22J584Z29/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The packaging is well done. It’s modestly folded from a nicely textured black paper stock. Everything is done tastefully; there’s a debossed pattern on the front and the graphics are printed using a grey ink. I also like how the box is held together using&#160;plastic pegs on the sides of the box, rather than fussy tape. &#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557da33e4b02d567e6ff6fc\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431820852726-CKOKMPQGNESKANCX755B/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>To make SKU management easier, the various modular parts are&#160;individually packed in MRE-like packets. The graphical treatment is attractive and the label treatment on the backside is utilitarian.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431821446678-KRQBRKF4OUKCB4P5LGJN/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557dc82e4b02f3bca022382\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431821446678-KRQBRKF4OUKCB4P5LGJN/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431821680520-CZGF0EUXHVMZKOWKTMLW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557dd6fe4b0c59a45472a68\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431821680520-CZGF0EUXHVMZKOWKTMLW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The design of the TMA-2 is pretty much identical to its predecessor, the TMA-1. This is largely a good thing; the TMA-1’s simple, Scandinavian design was key to its success. The headphones are free of any unnecessary garnish and is made up of primitive, almost toy-like forms. It's not sophisticated but it's charming.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431822435981-01C65EV3EU42HZLXHP73/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e063e4b0df10506c119b\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431822435981-01C65EV3EU42HZLXHP73/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>What makes the TMA-2’s design work is the consistency of its details. Little things like the debossed L/R graphics really make the TMA-2 feel like a holistically conceived device.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431822274356-Y5VHITM76H9L3U4MUPU5/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557dfc1e4b01c8e63a51223\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431822274356-Y5VHITM76H9L3U4MUPU5/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Like its predecessor, the TMA-2 has a soft-touch finish. It’s something I’ve never liked because it wears poorly and almost always turns gummy over time. The soft-touch coating used here seams to exhibit the same kind of poor durability. After just a week of use, I’ve been noticing some scraping on the top of the&#160;headband (visible in this photo). It may look&#160;good in photos and feel nice out of the box but it really isn’t a surface treatment with longevity in mind.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431822362945-6VWGD8Z1KV6QL32UG5CF/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e019e4b028241f155101\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431822362945-6VWGD8Z1KV6QL32UG5CF/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Like all of AIAIAI's products, the&#160;TMA-2 falls short is in execution. I can only describe&#160;the quality of molding here as being mediocre. The headband has molding defects everywhere – you can see a severe case of sink marks and flash on the headband. This is unacceptable in my opinion, especially when you consider that these headphones are competing in the $200+ price range.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824394999-X4CMVHOVWH1C3QICHDPC/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e80ae4b0ee228d1890f2\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824394999-X4CMVHOVWH1C3QICHDPC/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Even with just two pairs of speakers and earpads, I found the variety of combinations I could make a bit overwhelming at first. I wondered how people would even go about purchasing their initial configuration and it turned out that AIAIAI had a great solution. They have a useful <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://aiaiai.dk/configurator\">online configurator </a>that lets you customize your headphones presented with a dynamic graph showing a sound profile for each configuration. If you like spending time on car configurators, you’ll enjoy this.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557eb6be4b0d1d3fb240cfd\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431825260858-BH5D4KH65U4SNWZ077GE/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Unlike the TMA-1, the TMA-2 features headphone jacks on both sides of the headphones - a welcome change.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n
