data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e413e4b0c9f3319580ec\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431823379973-EVO48ZZN434277SL1398/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431823446389-YL5HQA7HW2LG2AZN3XKX/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e452e4b0607a0bacf366\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431823446389-YL5HQA7HW2LG2AZN3XKX/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n<h2>H02&#160;<br />50 USD</h2><p>The H02 headband is made from nylon with a compression molded silicone headband. It’s completely void of any mechanical features and relies on material flex to fit over your ears. This does mean that it produces a significant amount of pressure on your ears. I find that on-ear earpads become too uncomfortable for extended use with the headband.</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431823499572-R2V23RCTFKW72WUU6MGT/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e488e4b0607a0bacf42c\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431823499572-R2V23RCTFKW72WUU6MGT/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431823472683-310BKM8Q34ENBL2XJBU3/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e46de4b0607a0bacf3bb\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431823472683-310BKM8Q34ENBL2XJBU3/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n<h2>C06<br />40 USD</h2><p>The 1.2m long C06 is the ideal cable for those intending to use the headphones with Apple devices. It features playback controls and also an in-line microphone. I like the smooth, matte finish of the cable as well.&#160;</p>&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824155580-3R0PMRXQV60FBVYBLH8X/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e717e4b081dbcc247d6b\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824155580-3R0PMRXQV60FBVYBLH8X/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2>S03<br />90 USD</h2><p>The first thing you’ll notice about the TMA-2 speaker units is that they’re hard to tell apart from eachother. A small label on the inside of the unit is the only way to tell them apart and otherwise look completely identical. The S03 is designed to have “warm” sound. It has a titanium coated driver, which is fully sealed delivering a rich sound with emphasis on bass.</p><p> </p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824247923-RI1P7TS4GMQYLANYXDV8/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/20150516-L1001905.jpg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"20150516-L1001905.jpg\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e776e4b02d567e70201b\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824247923-RI1P7TS4GMQYLANYXDV8/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/20150516-L1001905.jpg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h1>S04<br />100 USD</h1><p>AIAIAI says that this one is meant to be “vibrant”. It has a Japanese voice coil and a lightweight diaphragm, which are designed for high sensitivity and increased details. The S04,&#160;like the S03, are still heavier on the bass side but offer a bit more emphasis on the treble offering a better balance. As you can see here, the TMA-2 uses a spring-loaded peg to position itself on the headband. It works but the completely plastic construction makes a terrible racket when you adjust them.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431899158902-R8O37NY1DYKWZQW6TUL6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/20150516-L1001915.jpg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"20150516-L1001915.jpg\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"55590c15e4b0c2b7c9e67ea9\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431899158902-R8O37NY1DYKWZQW6TUL6/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/20150516-L1001915.jpg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2>E02<br />35 USD</h2><p>AIAIAI sent me two earpads, the E02 and E05. The E02s are made from polyurethane faux leather and sit on the ear. Producing a tight seal around the ear, the E02 earpads narrow sound stage and increases isolation and bass. As I've said, I personally find them to be too tight for extended use.&#160;</p><p> </p><h2>E05<br />50 USD</h2><p>The E05 earpads offer superior comfort thanks to its over-ear design and microfiber finish. The E05s make soundstage wider and help neutralize the sound profile of bass-heavy speaker units. I really don’t like the shoddy craftsmanship and&#160;how much a dust magnet they are but keep going back to them because of their comfortable nature.&#160;</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824276983-IS61R5YBIWWS4W003206/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e793e4b0a213bdd4b428\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824276983-IS61R5YBIWWS4W003206/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The TMA-2 uses a simple popper system to mount the earpads. Modularity is a special idea so emphasizing this with something like magnetic earpads would have been a nice touch.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824489804-AT89YNM6CS37US5AMSES/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e865e4b02de6a6ebcc18\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824489804-AT89YNM6CS37US5AMSES/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2 class=\"text-align-center\">S03 + E02<br />215 USD</h2><p>This combination produces a&#160;rich sound that’s probably the way the S03 units are meant to be enjoyed. Bass becomes the star of the show with highs being pushed a bit to the background. I’ve found this configuration to be better in higher volumes and with punchier music&#160;like pop or hip hop. This isn't personally a combination I would buy because&#160;the E02 earpads reduce soundstage significantly and the S03 speaker units lack too much clarity.&#160;</p><p class=\"text-align-center\"><span>★</span><span>★</span><span>☆</span><span>☆</span></p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824775788-6FJB25PMUA2F28UJGF7C/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e986e4b0ee228d18952c\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824775788-6FJB25PMUA2F28UJGF7C/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2 class=\"text-align-center\">S03 + E05<br />230 USD</h2><p>This combination feels&#160;flat with the mids becoming more pronounced than the previous combination. I prefer the more delicate rendering of bass here and also like how the E05 pads significantly expands the sound stage. Some may find the neutral sound characteristic a bit too boring but it has low fatigue and is good for extended listening. If there was a bit more detail here, this combination could have been a winner.&#160;</p><p class=\"text-align-center\"><span>★</span><span>★</span><span>★</span><span>☆</span></p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824739854-6FZ7VBZPUM9QIE08UZF2/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e962e4b02d69c9a90368\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824739854-6FZ7VBZPUM9QIE08UZF2/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2 class=\"text-align-center\">S04+ E02<br />225 USD</h2><p>If bass is all that matters, this is probably the best bet. I find the sound way too unbalanced as the bass ends up overpowering everything. There’s little detail, the soundstage is too narrow, making it all&#160;feel&#160;claustrophobic. Not a fan.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\"><span>★☆☆</span><span>☆</span></p><p> </p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824820149-ZHL0BPZE7A9AO9YFJ51D/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557e9b3e4b0df10506c2eb9\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824820149-ZHL0BPZE7A9AO9YFJ51D/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2 class=\"text-align-center\">S04&#160;+ E05<br />240 USD</h2><p>Probably the most detailed and vibrant configuration. This one is my favorite, with the most amount of versatility in its sound profile. Bass is well rendered and punchy but doesn’t overpower the mids or treble. The E05 earpads help widen the soundstage and also allows you to enjoy the sensitive nature of the S04 speaker units. The vibrant sound of this combination seems to make this the ideal combination for everyday, casual use.&#160;</p><p class=\"text-align-center\"><span>★</span><span>★★</span><span>☆</span></p><p> </p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824950590-S9Y9M6ZFXOGTAL0EW8Q5/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x795\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"5557ea35e4b0cc5c1edfa368\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1431824950590-S9Y9M6ZFXOGTAL0EW8Q5/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kEiREASJXjyg0FkDBg-2yS8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKc1K8ldZA7K2WotbX7g-T4rwDJL9JhGS5fgJhTOZomK_ZCeT-Z1M3jcJV0yIxIoKKg/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p class=\"text-align-center\">Final score<br /><span>★</span><span>★</span><span>★</span><span>☆</span></p><p>The TMA-2 is a wonderful concept. The ability to configure your own headphones really brings out the fun of discovering the delicate nature of sound. It was eye opening to find out that my least and most favorable combinations both used the same speaker units -&#160;I seemed to have underestimated the amount of impact earpads could have on sound. If AIAIAI ups their game on build quality and design, they may have something really special here.</p>&#160;","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Mon, 18 May 2015 00:38:29 />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p><a href=\"http://www.ajoto.com/\">Ajoto</a> is a small company located in Manchester making simple and&#160;essential tools for creatives with an emphasis on craftsmanship. What drew me initially to them was their enthusiasm to share the manufacturing story behind their products. They even have a <a href=\"http://www.ajoto.com/factories/\">page</a> on their website dedicated to their suppliers and are willing to share what most companies would consider frivolous information. When they reached out and sent me their collection of products, I was pleasantly surprised to learn that unlike most small brands, they were actually serious about craftsmanship, rather than just the idea of being a company that does.&#160;This is a refreshing change.</p><hr /><p class=\"text-align-center\"><span>DISCLAIMER</span><br /><span>The products have&#160;been sent by Ajoto.</span></p><hr /><p class=\"text-align-center\">★☆☆☆<br />Avoid. Mediocre.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\">★★☆☆<br />Good, but nothing exceptional.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\">★★★☆<br />Great.&#160;Worth purchasing.</p><p class=\"text-align-center\">★★★★<br />Exceptional. A spectacular product.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423372679117-75T0Y6J79Z5S18QAXQK1/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6f185e4b0b41c0249aece\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423372679117-75T0Y6J79Z5S18QAXQK1/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423372715783-OP1KQFKFFRVZCXT0WB15/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6f1aae4b0ba465b73a58e\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423372715783-OP1KQFKFFRVZCXT0WB15/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2>The Pen /Brass /£150</h2><p>The first of their products is called <em>The Pen</em>. It’s available in either brass or aluminum which are then plated or anodized in a variety of colors. We'll first talk about the former, which is brass model. One of the most delightful things about The Pen is its packaging. The box is made from&#160;a beautiful folded&#160;letterpressed paper stock that is torn open. Once torn, the packaging blooms open, revealing a silver foil pattern and an aluminum box. The attention to detail here is really worth praise.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423372787451-6TQA8ZMI9LOKG76I795A/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6f1f2e4b05cca7674a68f\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423372787451-6TQA8ZMI9LOKG76I795A/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The outer sleeve of the box is made of extruded aluminum and astonishingly has a nicer finish than many products out there. The aluminum extrusion surrounds a sliding&#160;cork tray that houses the actual pen. It really is one of the best unboxing experiences I’ve seen recently.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6f39ee4b0810ff750fd23\" data-type=\"image\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423373293373-G71FNXEM9MP356HXNKDC/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6f3ebe4b02ef1155f34db\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423373293373-G71FNXEM9MP356HXNKDC/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The molded cork tray makes a nice aesthetic touch while being a functional part that cushions the pen during transport. Ajoto says that the tray is made of waste material from wine bottle stopper manufacturing.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423374653515-3E3SE8VXG5BECZ116TIS/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6f93ce4b0340f2fb697f4\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423374653515-3E3SE8VXG5BECZ116TIS/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The Pen. Ajoto uses CZ109 brass composed of 60% Cu, 40% Zn&#160;and is notably lead free. Being brass, it oxidizes over time displaying&#160;an elegant patina. Other than being finished in a fine brushed texture, it’s free of ornamentation.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375138637-3W3JBGBR1804PV1RL2FH/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6fb21e4b0ed3e6945421f\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375138637-3W3JBGBR1804PV1RL2FH/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The design of the pen is pure and classic. It’s arguably too pure though - there’s nothing preventing it from rolling off a desk.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375183570-JN03E0KF9DZRQ3WNFYMO/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6fb4ee4b0ed3e694542b0\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375183570-JN03E0KF9DZRQ3WNFYMO/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Twisting the knob at the end of the pen reveals the rollerball tip. It operates using a screw, which in itself is a wonderful work of machining. A rubber gasket keeps things nice and dampened. It's simple yet effective.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375163480-QEJPTMXS1KZ8BI591T41/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6fb3ae4b0ed3e69454275\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375163480-QEJPTMXS1KZ8BI591T41/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The Pen is made&#160;in the UK using a lathe. It’s notable that the pen tapers slightly towards the back, giving it an elegant form and a downward weight bias for improved handling.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423429863910-5GN6WQVYPTL38YR0WBG9/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d0e6e4b0b12e04682932\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423429863910-5GN6WQVYPTL38YR0WBG9/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Ajoto includes a rollerball cartridge made in Germany. It’s marvelously smooth and has a versatile medium point. Refills are £12 for a pack of three.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430104721-5EVSNNQL01JLNZ7NU3XW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d1d7e4b0cd7c8af58a18\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430104721-5EVSNNQL01JLNZ7NU3XW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Using the pen makes it feel like everything you write is monumental. It has a significant heft and is fairly thick, making it a bit unwieldy at times to write with. It’s not something I’d grab to write a letter or sketch but is perfect for simple tasks like jotting down quick ideas or writing a check. It’s exceptionally attractive, making it something you want to keep at your desk too.</p><p>★★★★</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423374557077-A3IOEH20NCCP4BQQ9TTD/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6f8dbe4b0cd7c8af2fbf7\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423374557077-A3IOEH20NCCP4BQQ9TTD/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2>The Pen /Aluminum /£125</h2><p>Ajoto also offers an aluminum version of The Pen. It also comes inside an extruded aluminum box, although it’s anodized in black this time.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423374599982-7ON24YRGS98IQJ0R21YJ/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6f903e4b04cc77c73fe01\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423374599982-7ON24YRGS98IQJ0R21YJ/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Like its brass counterpart, the aluminum The Pen has an uncoated, finely spun finish and tapered design. It’s nice but aluminum requires a bit more work to get to a beautiful state, making this one less successful visually in comparison. In the wrong light, it may even come off as looking cheap. A fine anodized finish could have been more successful.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375038580-W9A6VT6EED8OUNBRO164/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6fabde4b0b788c0d9d610\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375038580-W9A6VT6EED8OUNBRO164/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>I was sent a model with the black anodized top, which I would personal avoid. Black anodization always ends up looking a bit too like plastic. The silver top version is probably the way to go.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375017560-7YUSAC14VYWXBPWHL05C/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d6faa8e4b0b788c0d9d5d7\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423375017560-7YUSAC14VYWXBPWHL05C/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Being made completely of aluminum, this&#160;pen is much lighter than the brass version. This makes for a completely different writing experience. The aluminum pen is far more comfortable for extended use and handles with agility. I would have preferred a nicer finish on the aluminum&#160;so&#160;I’d personally go with the patina-friendly brass version. Neither are cheap but that extra&#160;<span>£25 gets you something that feels far more substantial.</span></p><p>★★★☆</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2>The Pen Pouch&#160;/£30</h2><p>Ajoto offers a companion to The Pen, <em>The Pen Pouch</em>. Like the pen, it comes wrapped in paper packaging with thoughtful letterpressed details.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n        sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423463130724-IT9S8UMUWPUS1K3SHZMW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The leather is vegetable tanned in Italy and then hand made in the UK into the pouches. I think a smoother, more pliable hide would have been ideal, as the leather tends to wrinkle unattractively with the pen inserted.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423429766065-5N8JFXHXVKIVJAQ4EZSW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d084e4b0ed57c73186cd\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423429766065-5N8JFXHXVKIVJAQ4EZSW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Other than a bit of branding on the back side, the pouch is unadorned.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423429686767-6BM6FJ5B5M5GNRAFHL33/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d035e4b02ef11561cadf\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423429686767-6BM6FJ5B5M5GNRAFHL33/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>I would honestly skip The Pen Pouch. Ajoto also provided a caramel colored pouch and despite photographing well, it’s full of cosmetic faults like poor branding and severe wrinkling with the pen in place (probably because the leather is even thicker than the black model). Patina might make these shine over time but right out of the box, I wasn’t left impressed.</p><p><span>★★☆</span><span>☆</span></p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\"        sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430137002-1W7CKV53XUEYOW8AEPSO/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d1f7e4b02fde3d73440f\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430137002-1W7CKV53XUEYOW8AEPSO/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<h2>The Wallet /£69</h2><p>After being disappointed by The Pen Pouch, I wasn’t expecting much from <em>The Wallet</em>, which is made from the same leather and manufacturer as The Pen Pouch. Like the other Ajoto products, The Wallet comes in beautiful paper packaging.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430347221-0M3M3R1GRXNSK53P3SKU/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d2cae4b0ba465b764b45\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430347221-0M3M3R1GRXNSK53P3SKU/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The Wallet has a bifold design and is remarkably simple in design. It gave a first impression of being boring in design but redeemed itself by being well made and functional.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430359371-OFS0C68RCNVPR923WVCM/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d2d6e4b0ba465b764b78\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430359371-OFS0C68RCNVPR923WVCM/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>There are four compartments in total, one of which has an accordion design for bills and receipts. Each of the four compartments are able to take around three cards, which should be just about enough for most people.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430370178-JSH99HE5N8YY1QLRNSC3/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d2e0e4b0ba465b764bac\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430370178-JSH99HE5N8YY1QLRNSC3/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>The card slots have V cutouts making it easy to grab your cards. There’s a bit of branding here as well.</p>&#160;&#160;\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430385302-4WZ39B8FCWFHKCMYQ3CA/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d2f0e4b0ba465b764bf6\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430385302-4WZ39B8FCWFHKCMYQ3CA/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>As far as functionality goes, The Wallet is perfect if you’re like me and carry primarily cards and only a few bills for tipping the valet. A wallet is something that receives&#160;a ton of abuse overtime and this seems like something that’ll last many years thanks to its durable stitching and patina friendly surface. If the design was a little more clever and attractive like The Pen, this would have been a home-run.&#160;</p><p>★★★☆</p>&#160;&#160;<hr />\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n \n\n  \n  \n    \n\n      \n\n      \n        <figure class=\"\n              sqs-block-image-figure\n              intrinsic\n            \"\n        >\n          \n        \n        \n\n        \n          \n            \n          \n            <img class=\"thumb-image\" data-image=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430395190-ABLLLQT1CE7XGFJJGFMW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg\" data-image-dimensions=\"1200x800\" data-image-focal-point=\"0.5,0.5\" alt=\"\" data-load=\"false\" data-image-id=\"54d7d2fae4b0ba465b764c3d\" data-type=\"image\" src=\"https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/50271a61c4aab6c54f9af5ee/1423430395190-ABLLLQT1CE7XGFJJGFMW/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kPqQfq0L3n3wpHIsRapTfg8UqsxRUqqbr1mOJYKfIPR7LoDQ9mXPOjoJoqy81S2I8N_N4V1vUb5AoIIIbLZhVYxCRW4BPu10St3TBAUQYVKczo5Zn4xktlpMsMj-QlHXeMfNK6GwvtVkYEWiR8XAPyD3GfLCe_DXOSC_YcAacWL_/image-asset.jpeg?format=1000w\" />\n          \n        \n          \n        \n\n        \n      \n        </figure>\n      \n\n    \n  \n\n\n\n&#160;<p>Everyday, people ask me to review products ornamented by keywords like “craftsmanship” and “premium”. Most of the time, these promises simply don’t live up to the grand descriptions of their creators. I was afraid that Ajoto would be one of these instances but thankfully they were serious about their wording. It’s refreshing to see that there are people that still actually care about craft and don’t use the word because it’s fashionable to do so. We have surrounded ourselves with dishonest products, and that in turn seems to have created a culture of dishonest creators. Ajoto isn’t one of them. Let’s hope we see more people like them in the future.</p>&#160;&#160;","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Mon, 09 Feb 2015 08:35:00
